name: WebP 2 Image
summary: Learn about .WP2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Google began developing the WebP 2 format in June 2021 to replace the WebP format, which Google released in 2010. Google initially released WebP as an open format to improve upon the JPEG, PNG, and GIF formats. Images you will most likely see saved in the WebP 2 format are digital photos and web graphics.
Images saved in the WebP format are saved with the .webp file extension (.WEBP files), whereas images saved in the WebP 2 format are saved with the .wp2 file extension (WP2 files).

instructions: Google has not yet released the WebP 2 format, so support for WP2 files is limited. However, you can encode and decode WP2 images with the WebP 2 Codec Package. The cwp2 tool encodes WebP 2 images and the dwp2 tool decodes WebP 2 images.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
